TEXT: Allow Orb Mods Without Prismatic Shard
Modify Instant Obtain Cards (Bites, Pandora's Box, Curses, etc.)
EXTRA_TEXT: Adds randomly rolled card modifiers to card rewards. See the Mod Options if you would like to change any configurations!
